title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8152.10 - Town of Queensbury
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8152.10 - Town of Queensbury

State Regulations
(a) US
Route 9. US Route 9 between RM 2002+- and RM 2041+-. (b) Cronin Road. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Cronin Road from Route 9L to a point 0.5+- mile west of Route
9L. (c) Route 9L. Route 9L between

Route 254, Quaker Road and Hicks Road, CR 52. (d) CR 42 (Dix Avenue). The eastbound and
westbound roadways of CR 42 (Dix Avenue) between Route 254 and Route
32. (e) Route 32 (Dix Avenue). The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 32 (Dix Avenue) between CR 42 (Dix

Avenue) and the Warren/Washington county line. (f) CR 79 (The Boulevard). CR 79 (The

Boulevard) between Route 254 Bell Avenue, a distance of 0.5 mile. (g) Big Boom Road. The northbound and
southbound roadways of Big Boom Road from CR 28 (Corinth Road) to a point 0.3+-
mile south of CR 28 (Corinth Road). (h) CR 28 (Corinth Road). The eastbound and
westbound roadways of CR 28 (Corinth Road) between Big Boom Road and the
southbound exit ramp of IR 87 exit 18. (i) Route 254 (Quaker Road). Route 254
(Quaker Road) between a point 0.26+- mile east of US Route 9 and the Warren

County/Washington county line. (j) Route 149. Route 149 between the southbound on ramp of I-87 exit 20 and the

Warren County/Washington county line. (k) CR 52. CR 52, Hicks Road and County Line

Road, between Route 9L and the Roadway Express, Inc. terminal, a distance of
0.4+- mile. (l) Corinth Street. Corinth Street (CR 28) between I-87 exit 18 entrance and exit ramps and the

Town of Queensbury/City of Glens Falls line. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8152.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
